name: Letter Lattice
description:
A regular WordSearch has you stumbling through all 26 letters of the alphabet, but those are too easy for experienced players.
Instead, Letter Lattice sees you struggling to find words within a grid made up of only letters from the word itself.

It's certainly a harder experience when the whole grid looks like the word you're searching for!

There are hundreds of grids available to play through, with wildly varying difficulties.
Dare you attempt them all!?
